SEARCH
Package battleship.controller

Klasse Controller

java.lang.Object
battleship.controller.Controller
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IController
public class Controller extends Object implements IController
The controller class for the Battleship game, coordinating interactions between the model and the view. This controller handles user inputs and updates the game state accordingly. It uses a Model to manage the game logic and a IView to display the game state.
